column1: #text=Today I decided to borrow a book from the local library .
#text=I got dressed and headed out to the library .
#text=I was n't really sure what kind of book I wanted , other than a good novel or piece of fantasy fiction , so I started my search in the fiction section .
#text=I browsed the first few pages of several books while I was at the library to see if any interested me .
#text=Eventually , I came across a fantasy novel that looked really interesting to me .
#text=I took it up to the librarian and borrowed the book out for a week .
#text=The librarian collected some information for me and asked for my library card , before stamping my name in the back of the book .
#text=I took the book home and read it over the next several days .
#text=Once I was done , I made sure to return the book to the library before the due date , dropping it off in the library 's return box .
